oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Allied Catering Service, 1961 May 21
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Allied Mobile Snack Bar trucks of Allied Catering Services. They are cited in the 1965 City Directory, with Bob W. Armstrong, and James P. Gracy), located at 1038 W. Kirkland Avenue. The directory refers to a service for “office parties, sales meetings, company picnics and buffets.” Some of the trucks advertise they are a coffee-break service providing coffee, donuts and sandwiches. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 3 photograph negatives, filmstrip : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allied Catering Service (Nashville, Tenn.)
